snippet: Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton appeared to be trying to inoculate President Obama from criticism for any security lapses in Libya as he prepared for Tuesday’s debate.
abstract: Secretary of State Hillary Clinton takes responsibility for failure to successfully defend against September 11 attack on United States diplomatic compound in Benghazi, Libya; comment appears to be effort to inoculate Pres Obama from criticism for security lapses in Libya on eve of second presidential debate.
lead_paragraph: Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton appeared to be trying to inoculate President Obama from criticism for any security lapses in Libya as he prepared for Tuesday’s debate.

headline.seo: Clinton Takes Responsibility for Libya Security Failure
headline.main: Clinton Takes Responsibility for Security Failure in Libya
headline.print_headline: Clinton Takes Responsibility For Security Failure in Libya
